wikipedia_page.main: Wayne Hogg (born 24 September 1980) is a Scottish international indoor and lawn bowler.

He claimed the triples gold medal at the 2004 World Outdoor Bowls Championship with Jim McIntyre and Willie Wood. Four years later he repeated the success when winning the triples at the 2008 World Outdoor Bowls Championship with Wayne Hogg and Willie Wood.
||  Wayne Hogg   Willie Wood  David Peacock

Wilkie came to prominence after winning the Australian national championship and qualifying for the 2009 World Singles Champion of Champions event, where he won the gold medal defeating Wayne Hogg of Scotland in the final.
| align=center|  David Peacock, Willie Wood, Wayne Hogg
